titles.title: Ending Unemployment Payments to Jobless Millionaires Act of 2022
Ending Unemployment Payments to Jobless Millionaires Act of 2022
A bill to end unemployment payments to jobless millionaires.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Ending Unemployment Payments to Jobless Millionaires Act of 2022
This bill prohibits the use of federal funds for making unemployment compensation payments to an individual with an adjusted gross income equal to or greater than $1 million.
